B" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :The schematics indicate the device was manufactured by ''Allwins'' :and the stylized ''P'' is found on other ''Allwins'' products. :''Allwins'' is the presumed manufacturer. {{Seealso|ASUS RT-N10}} ==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== * [http://www.foxnetwork.ru/index.php/en/component/content/article/36-reviews/92-asus-rt-n10u.html ''Asus RT-N10U B'' Rewieved on '''FoxNetwork'''] :The default clock of the CPU SoC [[Broadcom]] [http://www.broadcom.com/products/Wireless-LAN/802.11-Wireless-LAN-Solutions/BCM5356x-Family BCM5356U] :@333MHz [[MIPS 74K]] in this unit seems to be 300MHz. ===Forum threads=== * [https://wl500g.info/showthread.php?28297-Asus-RT-N10U-N10UB-%F1-%EF%F0%EE%F8%E8%E2%EA%EE%E9-%EE%F2-%FD%ED%F2%F3%E7%E8%E0%F1%F2%EE%E2 '''wl500g.info''' ''thread''] ''about the device'' (in Russian) - covers [http://wl500g.info/showthread.php?28297-Asus-RT-N10U-N10UB&langid=3&p=242238#post242238 overclocking the CPU to 500MHz] and [http://wl500g.info/showthread.php?28297-Asus-RT-N10U-N10UB&langid=3&p=251117#post251117 upgrading the RAM to 64MB] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|wassupported}} {{OpenWrtNotice|broadcomwifi}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/asus/asus_rt-n10u_b |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/asus/rt-n10u |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = bcm47xx |subtarget = mips74k |arch = mipsel_74kc |support_started_version = 17.01.0 |current_supported_version = 22.03.5 |unsupportedfuncntions = [https://openwrt.org/unsupported/wifi_2.4ghz WiFi 2.4GHz] |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ===Flashing Tomato=== Please insert instructions here ==Pictures==
